dmca.title: Zee TV complains to Google about Streambox
dmca.body:
Dear [private]:

This law firm represents Zee Telefilms Ltd. and Zee TV USA, Inc. (collectively, with their subsidiaries and affiliates, "Zee TV"). We have been engaged by our client to pursue all available legal and equitable remedies for the unauthorized broadcast, distribution, and use of Zee TV's proprietary and copyrighted works, signal, programming, and content by the Internet website www.streambox.tv ("StreamBox"). Our research indicates that Google, Inc. ("Google") acts or has acted as the Internet service provider ("ISP") and/or host for the StreamBox website, and/or is in some other manner affiliated with the StreamBox domain name. The purpose of this letter is to demand that your company immediately remove or disable access to the infringing material in accordance with the Online Copyright Infringement Liability Limitation Act ("OCILLA"), 17 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Zee Telefilms Ltd. and Zee TV USA, Inc. ("ZEE TV")
